H0.text: Which Swedish actress won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for Murder on the Orient Express. Greta Garbo

H1.text: Which Swedish actress won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for Murder on the Orient Express. Anita Ekberg

H2.text: Which Swedish actress won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for Murder on the Orient Express. Mai Zetterling

H3.text: Which Swedish actress won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for Murder on the Orient Express. Ingrid Berman

A4.text: Bergman became one of the few actresses ever to receive three Oscars when she won her third (and first in the category of Best Supporting Actress) for her performance in Murder on the Orient Express (1974).
